sentences.en: But the topic and content of any particular referendum must be considered.
sentences.cn: 但公民投票题目和内容必须加以考虑.

sentences.en: He described the referendum as a one-horse race.
sentences.cn: 他称这次全民公决是一场胜负分明的比赛。

sentences.en: He tendered the committee a referendum.
sentences.cn: 他向该委员会提交了一份备忘录.

sentences.en: He told waiting journalists that he did not expect a referendum to be held for several months.
sentences.cn: 他告诉守候着的记者，他认为几个月内不会举行全民公决。

sentences.en: In general, it was the better-educated voters who voted Yes in the referendum.
sentences.cn: 通常是那些受教育程度较高的人在全民公决中投赞成票。

sentences.en: In the referendum many people abstained.
sentences.cn: 在这次公民投票中有许多人弃权.

sentences.en: It incorporated the initiative , referendum, and recall as part of the machinery of city politics.
sentences.cn: 更重要的是, 这项法令将创制 、 复决和罢免诸权作为城市政治机制的组成部分.

sentences.en: It's kind of a referendum, though a lot of issues are packed in.
sentences.cn: 这算是全民公决，虽然牵涉到很多问题。

sentences.en: Mr Abbas is now pushing for such a referendum.
sentences.cn: 阿巴斯先生正在全力推行这样的全民公决.

sentences.en: Nearly 10 million Iraqis cast ballots in the October 15 referendum.
sentences.cn: 将近1千万伊拉克人参加了10月15号的全民公投.

sentences.en: Parliament has bowed to the demand for a referendum next year.
sentences.cn: 议会在人们的要求下已同意在明年举行全民公投。

sentences.en: President Kaunda fulfilled his promise of announcing a date for the referendum.
sentences.cn: 卡翁达总统兑现了他的承诺，宣布了全民公决的日期。

sentences.en: Some called it a referendum, a term not used lightly in China.
sentences.cn: 有人称其为公投, 两个在中国鲜见的字.

sentences.en: The city council agreed to hold a referendum on the issue in November.
sentences.cn: 市政会同意在11月就此问题进行全民投票。

sentences.en: They warned him that a referendum might cause an explosion in the country.
sentences.cn: 他们警告他说全民公决可能会引发国内暴乱。

trans.tran_cn: 公民投票，外交官请示书，全民公决，请示书
trans.tran_en: when people vote in order to make a decision about a particular subject, rather than voting for a person
